Alternatively, if you're looking for something a bit more sinister and unsettling, "The Surgeon" might be more up your alley. This psychological thriller-horror feature film follows a performance artist with a scarred body and mind as she becomes embroiled in a sado-masochistic triangular love affair. Both of these movies are sure to provide a gripping and suspenseful viewing experience!
